ygData.subject: Re: [EQCheats] wizard issues (sorry for crosspost) trying for large  audience
ygData.msgSnippet: I dont know.  I played one, along with most of the other classes. Wizards ARE balanced....period. This sounds like another Make my class more powerful, and
ygData.messageBody:
I dont know. I played one, along with most of the other classes.
Wizards ARE balanced....period.
This sounds like another "Make my class more powerful, and more like
XYZ class" kinda thread.
Dont like an aspect of a class? Dont play it.
But, hey....you cant make everybody happy, can ya?

Stormhand
Shaman - Tunare
>
> What is the problem with wizards?
> That they have the best DDs and never get resisted?
>
> I personally think they are a bit dull to play since its only med, nuke
and
> teleport you can do but they get resisted WAY less then my shaman (did 0
> damage with spells on Dracolich and 20 damage total in melee while the
> wizards did about 3-4 thousand each) but what is the problem?
>
> Drokk lvl 50 troll shaman
> Jenna lvl 13 DE wizard
>
